title: MT5 Multiple Accounts Manager Request
description: (This API call is deprecated) This call allows to manage manager for MT5 account

passthrough.description: [Optional] field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

action.description: [Optional] Pass this if you want to revoke current manager assigned to mt5 account

req_id.description: [Optional] field to map request to response
